author: Hanyuu Furude
comment: Great app the only epub reader that works needs to be updated for wear 2.0 play store since android phones don't sync apps anymore

author: Raj
comment: Probably the best reader. Especially for txt format

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: This is a rip off! Do not buy! It's absolutely impossible to transfer books with it. If I use another app for the transfer, it's still impossible to open them with this garbage. Do not buy!

author: Charles Frank
comment: Absolutely fantastic app.  The ONLY reader app for Android Wear that actually works...and works well.  Autoscroll, clean, efficient interface, fonts, optional folders, PDF support, etc.  Really great job!

author: simon b
comment: Would like auto scrolling of pages. Maybe bigger text options as well.  But it works which is the most important thing.
title: It works

author: Manh DN
comment: Your reader is very good for me, it helps me to bring a library to my wrist. But it will be much better if you can make it scroll my book automatically.   You know, it is not comfortable when I need to keep touching my tiny screen for each ten words (or something like that), so if the app had a mod that named Auto Scroll that automatically sroll my book every 15 seconds, It will be perfect. Pls take a look at my request. Thanks so much.
title: Automatically scrolling

author: Kelly Reebe
comment: Took awhile for it to load on the watch. Working now.
title: Help

author: rebecca welsh
comment: I can't fathom how u work your magic but thank you!
title: Finally found great reader

author: shivam panchariya
comment: please add wrist gestures to turn pages

author: Candace Moore
comment: I followed the instructions on how to load books on this reader and it works perfectly. I even downloaded a bible which was 9mb and it worked.Using Asus zenwatch 2. Good job developer!
title: Awesome reader!

author: Craig Small
comment: Didn't work at first but dev was very understanding and fixed it. Now I can read my ebooks just fine on my LG G watch. Cheers dev!
title: Service with a smile.

author: Barbu Octavian
comment: The application does not appear on my LG Watch R.  Can you fix the problem ?
title: Not working

author: Piotr Wilhelm
comment: The most functional ereader for android  wear, it's great not having to scroll just tap the bottom corners to turn the page. Only complaint is that when the watch goes to sleep the app closes out. There should be a setting if you want to leave the reader running.

reply.author: Jajaz.org
reply.content: Hi! I think what i fixed problem with you watch. Please check it.
